review_data.title: Excellent Paella and Michelin rated star Chef David Martinez Salvany was really awesome!
review_data.content: Mediacampus is located around the corner from the SBB Werkstatt (Bus #31). The place opens early, for lunch and afterwards for midday snacks. During the lunch hour the place offers soups, salad, special burgers, hot meals, veggie options and more. The interior seating area is...More
